An essay for the recording of illustrious providences wherein an account is given of many remarkable and very memorable events which have hapned this last age, especially in New-England / by Increase Mather, teacher of a church at Boston in New-England. Mather, Increase, 1639-1723.
[22], 372, [9] p.
Printed by Samuel Green for Joseph Browning and are to be sold at his shop ..., Boston in New-England : 1684.
Errata on p. 372. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
